<Link id="l02015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2015"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2016"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Try to hoist an AGPR to VGPR copy across a PHI.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2017"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This should allow folding of an AGPR into a consumer which may support it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2018"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2019"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Example 1: LCSSA PHI</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2020"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      loop:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2021"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        %1:vreg = COPY %0:areg</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2022"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      exit:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2023"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        %2:vreg = PHI %1:vreg, %loop</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2024"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  =&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2025"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      loop:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2026"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      exit:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2027"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        %1:areg = PHI %0:areg, %loop</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2028"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        %2:vreg = COPY %1:areg</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2029"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2030"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Example 2: PHI with multiple incoming values:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2031"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      entry:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2032"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        %1:vreg = GLOBAL&#95;LOAD(..)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2033"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      loop:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2034"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        %2:vreg = PHI %1:vreg, %entry, %5:vreg, %loop</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2035"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        %3:areg = COPY %2:vreg</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2036"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        %4:areg = (instr using %3:areg)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2037"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        %5:vreg = COPY %4:areg</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2038"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  =&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2039"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      entry:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2040"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        %1:vreg = GLOBAL&#95;LOAD(..)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2041"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        %2:areg = COPY %1:vreg</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2042"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      loop:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2043"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        %3:areg = PHI %2:areg, %entry, %X:areg,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2044"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        %4:areg = (instr using %3:areg)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2045" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sifoldoperands-cpp-/sifoldoperandsimpl/#a17772fd1beeccd740ec6412abad098f9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sifoldoperands-cpp-/sifoldoperandsimpl/#a17772fd1beeccd740ec6412abad098f9">SIFoldOperandsImpl::tryFoldPhiAGPR</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpurewriteundefforphi-cpp/#a2e83cb1bc3f5e8986cbd14575755a134">PHI</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2104"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If this is a multi-use SGPR -&gt; VGPR copy, use V&#95;ACCVGPR&#95;WRITE on</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2105"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// GFX908 directly instead of a COPY. Otherwise, SIFoldOperand may try</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2106"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to fold the sgpr -&gt; vgpr -&gt; agpr copy into a sgpr -&gt; agpr copy which</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2107"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is unlikely to be profitable.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2108"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2109"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note that V&#95;ACCVGPR&#95;WRITE is only used for AGPR&#95;32.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2110"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand">MachineOperand</a> &amp;CopyIn = Def-&gt;getOperand(1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2111"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (IsAGPR32 &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sifoldoperands-cpp-/sifoldoperandsimpl/#a7a1e046b8ad8a2f498a2c1fadbbe1edc">ST</a>-&gt;hasGFX90AInsts() &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sifoldoperands-cpp-/sifoldoperandsimpl/#ac84cecb52ca09605285ef50620fdeb02">MRI</a>-&gt;hasOneNonDBGUse(Reg) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2112"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sifoldoperands-cpp-/sifoldoperandsimpl/#a6917282da348ebaf7919a7c0e66b1c93">TRI</a>-&gt;isSGPRReg(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sifoldoperands-cpp-/sifoldoperandsimpl/#ac84cecb52ca09605285ef50620fdeb02">MRI</a>, CopyIn.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineoperand/#ac0035d7c1c860501c877c20e6e93297b">getReg</a>()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2113"><Highlight kind="normal">          CopyOpc = AMDGPU::V&#95;ACCVGPR&#95;WRITE&#95;B32&#95;e64;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2114"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2115"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2116"><Highlight kind="normal">      InsertMBB = Def-&gt;getParent();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2117"><Highlight kind="normal">      InsertPt = InsertMBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a5d8a45757c9861d499cba1a0d54e2c1e">SkipPHIsLabelsAndDebug</a>(++Def-&gt;getIterator());</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2199"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Folded &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2202"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2203"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2204"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// tryFoldPhiAGPR will aggressively try to create AGPR PHIs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2205"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For GFX90A and later, this is pretty much always a good thing, but for GFX908</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2206"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// there&#39;s cases where it can create a lot more AGPR-AGPR copies, which are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2207"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// expensive on this architecture due to the lack of V&#95;ACCVGPR&#95;MOV.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2208"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2209"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This function looks at all AGPR PHIs in a basic block and collects their</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2210"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// operands. Then, it checks for register that are used more than once across</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2211"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// all PHIs and caches them in a VGPR. This prevents ExpandPostRAPseudo from</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2212"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// having to create one VGPR temporary per use, which can get very messy if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2213"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// these PHIs come from a broken-up large PHI (e.g. 32 AGPR phis, one per vector</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2214"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// element).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2215"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2216"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Example</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2217"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      a:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2218"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        %in:agpr&#95;256 = COPY %foo:vgpr&#95;256</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2219"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      c:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2220"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        %x:agpr&#95;32 = ..</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2221"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      b:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2222"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        %0:areg = PHI %in.sub0:agpr&#95;32, %a, %x, %c</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2223"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        %1:areg = PHI %in.sub0:agpr&#95;32, %a, %y, %c</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2224"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        %2:areg = PHI %in.sub0:agpr&#95;32, %a, %z, %c</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2225"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//  =&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2226"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      a:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2227"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        %in:agpr&#95;256 = COPY %foo:vgpr&#95;256</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2228"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        %tmp:vgpr&#95;32 = V&#95;ACCVGPR&#95;READ&#95;B32&#95;e64 %in.sub0:agpr&#95;32</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2229"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        %tmp&#95;agpr:agpr&#95;32 = COPY %tmp</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2230"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      c:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2231"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        %x:agpr&#95;32 = ..</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2232"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//      b:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2233"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        %0:areg = PHI %tmp&#95;agpr, %a, %x, %c</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2234"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        %1:areg = PHI %tmp&#95;agpr, %a, %y, %c</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2235"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//        %2:areg = PHI %tmp&#95;agpr, %a, %z, %c</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2236" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sifoldoperands-cpp-/sifoldoperandsimpl/#a8562a883d9494266aca5d1b2f8b5dc5e"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sifoldoperands-cpp-/sifoldoperandsimpl/#a8562a883d9494266aca5d1b2f8b5dc5e">SIFoldOperandsImpl::tryOptimizeAGPRPhis</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2237"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is only really needed on GFX908 where AGPR-AGPR copies are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2238"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// unreasonably difficult.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2239"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sifoldoperands-cpp-/sifoldoperandsimpl/#a7a1e046b8ad8a2f498a2c1fadbbe1edc">ST</a>-&gt;hasGFX90AInsts())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2240"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2241"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2242"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Look at all AGPR Phis and collect the register + subregister used.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
